sentences.en: a saturated solution of sodium chloride
sentences.cn: 氯化钠饱和溶液

sentences.en: a weak sugar solution
sentences.cn: 淡淡的糖溶液。

sentences.en: Absent a solution, people like Sue Godfrey will just keep on fighting.
sentences.cn: 假如得不到解决，像休·戈弗雷这样的人就会一直坚持斗争下去。

sentences.en: Any solution must be acceptable to all sides.
sentences.cn: 任何解决办法都必须能为各方所接受。

sentences.en: Attempts to find a solution have failed.
sentences.cn: 试图找到解决办法的种种努力全都失败了。

sentences.en: He arrived at the solution by a simple process of deduction.
sentences.cn: 他通过一番简单的推理得出了解决问题的方法。

sentences.en: He has attempted to find a peaceful solution to the Ossetian conflict.
sentences.cn: 他试图寻求和平解决奥赛梯冲突的方案。

sentences.en: He put his retirement on hold until he had found a solution.
sentences.cn: 他推迟了退休，直到他找到了解决办法。

sentences.en: he solution of glucose in water
sentences.cn: 葡萄糖在水中的溶解

sentences.en: Hiring a nanny has turned out to be the perfect solution.
sentences.cn: 雇用保姆结果成了解决问题的最佳方法。

sentences.en: It was only a partial solution to the problem.
sentences.cn: 那只是部分地解决了这个问题。

sentences.en: Neither solution seemed satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 两个解决方案似乎都不合适。

sentences.en: One possible solution, if all else fails, is to take legal action.
sentences.cn: 如果其他办法都不行，还有一种可能是提起诉讼。

sentences.en: Only a political solution could put an end to the violence.
sentences.cn: 只有政治解决方案才能终结暴力。

sentences.en: Remove stains by soaking in a mild solution of bleach.
sentences.cn: 用温和的漂白剂浸泡以去除污迹。

sentences.en: saline solution
sentences.cn: 盐溶液

sentences.en: The best solution would be for them to separate.
sentences.cn: 最好的解决方法是他们分开。

sentences.en: The solution to last week’s puzzle is on page 12.
sentences.cn: 上星期字谜的谜底在第 12 页。

sentences.en: There is no easy short-term solution to Britain's chronic economic malaise.
sentences.cn: 短期内迅速治愈英国经济顽症的灵丹妙药并不存在。

sentences.en: Vitamins in solution are more affected than those in solid foods.
sentences.cn: 溶液里的维生素比固体食物里的维生素受到的影响更大。

words.tran_cn: [化学] 可溶的，可溶解的；可解决的
可以解决的；可以解的；可溶的
有偿付能力的；有溶解力的
[化学] 溶质；[化学] 溶解物
[数] 可解性；解决之可能性；溶解度
[化学] 溶解；[化学] 溶剂化作用；溶化
解决者；[计] 解算机；[数] 求解程序

phrases.tran_cn: 在不断变化中；动摇不定；在溶解状态中
数值解；数值解释；近似解
方案供应商；解决方案提供者

trans.tran_en: a way of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation
